name: atomberg-raycast-extension
title: Atomberg - Smart Home Control
description: Control your Atomberg smart fans and appliances directly from Raycast
author: gupta_ji

commands.name: list-atomberg-devices
commands.title: My Atomberg Devices
commands.subtitle: View and control your Atomberg appliances
commands.description: List and control your Atomberg smart fans and appliances

commands.name: manage-atomberg-credentials
commands.title: Manage Atomberg Credentials
commands.subtitle: View and reset your Atomberg API credentials
commands.description: View current API credentials and reset them if needed

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Atomberg API Key from the developer portal

preferences.name: refreshToken
preferences.title: Refresh Token
preferences.description: Your Atomberg Refresh Token from the developer portal

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
